EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Solar for Your New Home
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
Once again, congratulations on your new home!
As your builder’s solar provider, SunPower is here to get you started on the road to incredible monthly savings, but we might have the wrong telephone number. The number that we have on file is {!Lead.Phone}. Please give us a call at 1-800-268-0331 to update your information, or reply to this email with your phone number and a good time to contact you.
In the meantime, we invite you to learn more about SunPower® home solar and how it’s transforming the way people generate the clean, renewable energy they need every day. Visit the SunPower Community: http://us.sunpower.com/community/share-your-stories-about-solar/ and learn what others are saying about their switch to home solar.
We look forward to hearing from you soon!
Warmly,
Your Solar Advisor Team 1-800-268-0331 SolarAdvisors@SunPower.com
Together, let’s change the way our world is powered.
